post.author: 이성기

comment.author: jameslee
comment.content: Most of time, the voice quality is very good. but sometimes it gets choppy depending on the traffic. You can use anywhere if you can connect to a wireless router. If the internet connection is down, so is your phone.

post.content: 기존 전화기에 비해서 Voip는 어떤 장단점이 있을까요? 혹시 경험해 보신 분이 있나요?
post.title: Voip 전화기를 사용하시는 분이 있나요?
